title: Johnson-Odim on women rulers in Africa - claims

content.question: Which of the following claims does the author make about women in West and West Central African societies?

choices.label: Women engaged in the transport of goods between West African kingdoms.
Women presided over the affairs of groups outside of their kingdoms.
Women actively participated in the political functions of their communities.
Women focused on the religious conversion of the subjects in their kingdoms.

content.answer: Women actively participated in the political functions of their communities.

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
